reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, cozy, and of great quality, with beautiful lines that can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft & versatile.
items.body: True to size, uber comfortable, soft cardigan. Quality fabrication and construction from this brand. A+++. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, warmth, style
items.body: This is the softest, warmest, and most flattering open front, shawl-collared sweater I have ever owned. I ordered a medium, and found it to be a generous fit. I usually wear a petite medium and was pleased that the sleeves, which are quite long, have rib knit for several inches so that they will stay put if pushed up on my short arms, and look good that way. Pulling the shawl collar up and wrapping the sweater close creates a cozy experience. Read more
items.author: Nana Nan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much!!
items.body: Wow wow wow. Barefoot dreams is my new favorite thing in the world. They have some kind of magic woven fabric that is so soft and the perfect weight. I want one of everything! Read more
items.author: T-Wow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love barefoot dreams!
items.body: Super soft and warm… Nothing better than barefoot dreams products. Read more
items.author: prolific reader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan
items.body: Super soft and comfy cardigan Read more
items.author: SG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better to view in a store
items.body: I was previously given this cardigan as a gift. It is true to size (I got XS—5’4”/120 lbs) although the sleeves are a bit snug and I have very thin arms. True to the hype it is sooooooo soft and comfortable! With cold Wisconsin winter ahead I decided to treat myself to a couple more! Both came extremely creased and wrinkled! I ordered silver but it looks like a light taupe (pink undertone) and I preferred a cooler shade of grey so it is going back. I also got black but it is a lighter black vs jet black and does not seem as silky soft as the one I have or the other one I ordered. I will try steaming it to see if the creases fall out. Read more
items.author: Martinmaiden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft
items.body: Super soft and easy to wear for breezy nights Read more
items.author: Sharon L.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks comfy but…..,,
items.body: Amazon shows to have delivered this item but I absolutely did not receive it. Interesting that the most expensive item among several other items arrived but this one I guess went to Narnia. Reached out to Amazon and was told to wait until 8pm today to see if it still shows up. Nope. Still not here. NOT HAPPY. Buyer beware, looks comfy and I love this brand but hard to review an item that didn’t come. Read more
items.author: Robert T Maslyn

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sea Salt, Taupe, Sand, Pewter, Black, Carbon, Stone. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
